localResource.name: startDate
localResource.label: startDate
localResource.queryString: SELECT Distinct cast(date_trunc('month', o.the_date) as date) as active_months FROM calendar as o WHERE extract(YEAR FROM o.the_date) >= coalesce((SELECT extract(YEAR FROM a.var_datetime) FROM History_configuration as a WHERE a.var_name = 'firstSync'), extract(YEAR FROM cast('01/01/2019' as timestamp))) AND extract(YEAR FROM o.the_date) <= (SELECT extract(YEAR FROM b.var_datetime) FROM History_configuration as b WHERE b.var_name = 'lastHourAggr') AND extract(MONTH FROM o.the_date) >= coalesce((SELECT extract(MONTH FROM a.var_datetime) FROM History_configuration as a WHERE a.var_name = 'firstSync'),extract(MONTH FROM cast('01/01/2019' as timestamp))) AND extract(MONTH FROM o.the_date) <= (SELECT extract(MONTH FROM b.var_datetime) FROM History_configuration as b WHERE b.var_name = 'lastHourAggr') ORDER BY active_months
